page.title: 09THE UNIVERSITY
page.content: The University grew out of the former Hartley institue and currently has faculties in Arts, Engineering, Law, Mathematics, Medicine, Sciences, Social Sciences and Educational studies. During the present year the students have numbered 6250, the greatest numbers being in the Science and Engineering Faculties. Apart from fine buildings erected in the post-war perid, the University owns most of the houses in University Road and these are used for a variety of purposes ranging from offices, medical and dental surgeries, to a Nursery and even a Smoking-therapy building. The University offers sporting and Cultural activities through its sports hall, the Nuffield Theatre, Turner Sims Concert Hall, John Hansard Art Gallery and its Library.
